variables.name: Economic activity status
variables.desc: People in employment, looking for work or waiting to start a job.

categories.name: Economically active: In employment (including full-time students)
Economically active (excluding full-time students): In employment: Employee
Economically active (excluding full-time students): In employment: Self-employed with employees
Economically active (excluding full-time students): In employment: Self-employed without employees
Economically active (excluding full-time students): Unemployed: Seeking work or waiting to start a job already obtained: Available to start working within 2 weeks
categories.legend_str_3: seeking work or waiting to start a job already obtained

categories.name: Economically active and a full-time student: In employment
Economically active and a full-time student: Unemployed: Seeking work or waiting to start a job already obtained: Available to start working within 2 weeks
categories.legend_str_3: unemployed full-time student seeking work or waitin to start a job already obtained

categories.name: Economically Inactive: Looking after home or family
categories.legend_str_3: full-time looking after home or family

categories.name: Economically inactive: Long-term sick or disabled

variables.name: Unemployment history
variables.desc: Classifies people who are unemployed into short-term unemployment, long-term unemployment and those who have never worked.

categories.name: Short-term unemployed: Worked in the last 12 months
categories.legend_str_3: short-term unemployed: worked in the last 12 months

categories.name: Long-term unemployed: Not worked in the last 12 months
categories.legend_str_3: long-term unemployed: not worked in the last 12 months

variables.name: Hours worked
variables.desc: The number of hours people work per week.
